\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\* extras.t This module forms part of the adv3Lite library (c) 2012-13 Eric Eve This file contains a number of (in principle) optional classes that can be used in addition to Thing. A game does not need to use any of these classes since authors can always just set the appropriate properties on thing, but some authors may find them a convenience, or may find that using them improves the clarity of their code.
